snippet: The National Portrait Gallery in London has purchased a self-portrait by the highly regarded British artist Craigie Aitchison that is covered with slash marks put there by the artist himself, the BBC reported.
abstract: The National Portrait Gallery in London has purchased a self-portrait by the highly regarded British artist Craigie Aitchison that is covered with slash marks put there by the artist himself, the BBC reported.

headline.main: Britain's National Portrait Gallery Buys a Defaced Self-Portrait
